title: CERC proposes sops for higher PLF in peak hours by 10p
description: For thermal plants older than 25 years, the special allowance is proposed to be raised to ₹10.75 lakh per MW per year against ₹9.5 lakh per MW a year.However, the Central Electricity Regulatory Commission (CERC) has proposed to slash the return on equity for new transmission projects commissioned after April 2024 by 50 basis points to 15%. This could be," marginally negative" for Power Grid Corporation of India, according to industry experts.
